lead_paragraph: FEIL--Yvette. Beloved wife of the late Seymour. Devoted mother of Gloria and Dr. Frank Turetz, Joanne Feil and the late Dr. Edward Feil. Loving mother-in-law of Susan Feil. Cherished grandmother and great-grandmother. Graveside service 1pm Tuesday at United Hebrew Cemetery, Staten Island, NY. Contributions can be made the Yvette and Seymour Feil Scholarship Fund at Cornell-Weill Medical College, 525 E. 68th St., New York, NY 10021. 1/3
